name: 2D Shooter (vidhirai)
description:
A 2D Shooter Game which lets  users to destroy enemy spaceships. To win the game, clear all 3 levels. Defeat 5, 10, 15 enemies in each level respectively.

Runs on WebGL and MacOS

Modifications:

  1. Changed Player Spaceship Sprite
  2. Changed Enemy SpaceShip Sprite
  3. Added Custom Asteroids
  4. Changed Game Audio (game music, fire effects, etc.)
  5. Changed Font
  6. Created 3 Progressive levels
